page.title: 16CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: HIDE AND SEEK: The object of the game is to hide (from the person who is on)and not be found. How To Play: First you choose who is to be on,when this is done he/she has to count to one hundred while the others hide.When he/she has counted they then start to look for the players hiding. When every one playing has been found the player found first is on,so he/she starts to count. SNAP:The object of the game is to win all the cards off your opponent/s How To Play:To play this game you need picture cards.You then share these out between you and your opponents.Next the opponents to the left of the dealer places a card infront of them,do this in a circle,until two cards on the top of any pile are the same.Then shout snap.If you are first you win the cards
